title: Beta 3 - Bluetooth
content: + enable up to 100 WebSockets (only one session per socket!)

title: Beta 2 -
content: The last days I worked on publishing the aBrain REST API to GitHub and creating the Play Store entry. aBrain is now avaiable as closed beta! I'm looking for some interested beta tester.

title: Beta 1 - First public release
content: ... welcome you on my new page (I have changed from Jekyll to AngularJS.)! Next, I will publish a REST-API of my current project.
